Package com.peyrona.mingle.candi.unec.parser

Class ParseBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.peyrona.mingle.candi.unec.parser.ParseBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ParseDevice, ParseDriver, ParseInclude, ParseRule, ParseRuleThen, ParseScript, ParseUse
    public abstract class ParseBase
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for Transpilation Structures: each structure is an entity obtained from its corresponding source-code command.
    Author:
    Francisco Jos√© Morero Peyrona Official web site at: https://github.com/peyrona/mingle

    • Method Detail

      • serialize

        public abstract java.lang.String serialize()
        Serializes into JSON format this Transpiled Command Unit, returning the JSON representation of the command.

        INCLUDE and USE commands return null.

        Returns:
        The JSON representation of the command managed.

      • getClause

        public final com.peyrona.mingle.lang.lexer.Lexeme getClause​(java.lang.String sClauseName)
        Returns associated Lexeme with passed clause.
        The search for tokens is done among all tokens passed to this class constructor and using the array of string (representing the clauses of the command) passed to same constructor.

        Returned lexeme will be null if the clause has no arguments and will be null if the clause does not exist.

        Parameters:
        sClauseName -
        Returns:
        The Lexeme associated with passed clause.

      • getClauseContents

        public final java.util.List<com.peyrona.mingle.lang.lexer.Lexeme> getClauseContents​(java.lang.String sClauseName)
        Returns associated fragments with passed clause.
        The search for tokens is done among all tokens passed to this class constructor and using the array of string (representing the clauses of the command) passed to same constructor.

        Returned list will be empty if the clause has no arguments and will be null if the clause does not exist.

        Parameters:
        sClauseName -
        Returns:
        The tokens associated with passed clause or an empty list.

      • findInClause

        public final com.peyrona.mingle.lang.lexer.Lexeme findInClause​(java.lang.String sClauseName,
                                                               java.lang.String sWhatToFind)
        Searches for a lexeme inside a clause.
        Parameters:
        sClauseName - Clause name.
        sWhatToFind - Lexeme text to search for (case-insensitive).
        Returns:
        The lexeme or null if not found.

      • isClauseEmpty

        public boolean isClauseEmpty​(java.lang.String sClauseName)
        A clause is empty when it has no lexemes or all are delimiters (';' or '\n')
        Parameters:
        sClauseName - The clause name.
        Returns:
        true if clause is delimiter

      • addErrors

        protected final ParseBase addErrors​(int fromLine,
                                    int fromCol,
                                    java.util.List<com.peyrona.mingle.lang.interfaces.ICandi.IError> lstIn)
        When the error is reported by NAXE, the line 0 is the first line provided to NAXE, this method shifts the lines and column.
        Parameters:
        fromLine -
        fromCol -
        lstIn -
        Returns:
        Itself.

      • findID

        protected final com.peyrona.mingle.lang.lexer.Lexeme findID​(java.lang.String clause)
        Searches for an ID inside a clause adding proper errors, if any.

        It checks that:

        • It is only one word
        • The word is a valid identifier (not starts with digit & length <= nMAX_ID_LEN)
        • The word is not a reserved keyword
        Parameters:
        clause - Where to search.
        Returns:
        The ID or null if not found or not valid ID.
